ygData.subject: Skill Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question regarding the Kick skill.  My ranger (10th) has supposedly had the kick ability since level 5.  I spend a couple of seed-points in the
ygData.messageBody:
I have a question regarding the Kick skill. My ranger (10th) has supposedly had the
kick ability since level 5. I spend a couple of 'seed-points' in the skill at that
time and was hoping that it would increase like all combat skills. It has not. As
an experiment, I dropped another 15 points into it, so that it is now like 17-18. I
have NEVER successfully kicked anything.

I recently acquired the dodge skill, spent a couple of seed points and it has
increased to 45 with use.

What am I doing wrong?

Rand
